doc.title: A Good Whack: The Making of 'Tonya and Nancy: The Opera'
doc.plot: On May 2nd, 2006, "Tonya and Nancy: The Opera" premiered in Boston, MA. Before a single note was ever written, this opera received worldwide press coverage. With all this media scrutiny, a tiny budget, a host of inexperienced performers, and one week to put it all together, would the opera meet expectations? Would the producers, performers, and director crack under the pressure? These are just some of the questions "A Good Whack - The Making of 'Tonya and Nancy: The Opera'" explores during the opera's journey across the country. ...and Tonya Harding herself weighs in.
